meanings.definition: In a spotless manner; without any spots or stains.
meanings.sent1: She cleaned the house spotlessly before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The mirror was spotlessly clean, reflecting her image perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The detective's spotlessly white suit made him stand out at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation was spotlessly clean, untarnished by any rumors.
meanings.sent5: The snow-covered landscape sparkled spotlessly under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The spotlessly washed dishes gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The spotlessly white dress was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent3: The spotlessly clear sky promised a beautiful day ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her spotlessly honest nature was admired by everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The spotlessly polished silverware shone on the dining table.
